The substance of two sermons one touching composing of controversies, another touching unity of judgement and love amongst brethren : preached in two honourable conventions of parliament : the former, Jan. 27, 1657, the other, Feb. 4, 1658 / by Edward Reynolds ... Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
[4], 38, 32 p.
Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ..., London : 1659.
Imperfect: second sermon lacking on film. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

[4], 38, 32 p.
Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ..., London : 1659.
